summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing a potential helicopter trip in St. Barts. The email contains several typos and is sent from Epstein's iPhone. It is marked as confidential by JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, reaching out to Jes Staley regarding a helicopter trip.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, indicating a personal or professional connection.

connections.description: Epstein reaches out to Staley for a social invitation regarding a helicopter trip.

keyFacts: The email was sent on February 13, 2011.
Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley regarding a helicopter trip.
The email is marked as confidential by JPMorgan Chase.
